name: Organic Organs
description:
In this game, the role of the player is to collect organs from willing deceased organic beings, infused with the power of music from our holy organ. (coming soon™ ) 

Save lives! Help the circular economy! Be as organic as possible! Or just make a profit!

Made as part of Pocket Jam #4 at Pocket Gamer Connects Helsinki 2019.

Credits:

Programming:  Ilse Heino, Asser Salmela

Game art: Kimmo Seitz, Jorden Senior

Sounds and Music:  Leo Krechmer
